1463610.name: RPG Maker MZ - Living the Dream
1463610.description:
The Living the Dream Music Pack offers a great set of chill and expressive tunes to breath life and emotion into your new RPG. These 24 tracks provide unique sounds and songs that will complement multiple scenarios and as a result provide you with a strong soundtrack for your game.

With songs like In The Train and Final Destination, as well as Last Night, Coffee Break and Morning Routine, creators will have a great variety of musical tones to support their adventure when it comes to exploring new lands or discovering even more stories about their lead characters.

Features:

* 24 royalty-free songs
* mp3, m4a, wav, ogg and looping ogg formats included
* For use in RPG Maker series or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

01_Last night
02_Dreamy
03_Morning routine
04_Terminal
05_In the train
06_Social phobia
07_Final destination
08_FxxKing boss
09_Busy and Razy
10_Coffee break
11_She so cute
12_Teenager
13_Nostalgia
14_Stress
15_Call from her
16_Drunk beat
17_Heroin
18_Celtic
19_China
20_Islamic
21_Primitive
22_Loneliness
23_Wanna be Hero
24_Endroll

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1463610.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
